text: DEADLOCK HANDLING When the DBMS detects a deadlock, it will select a "victim" txn to rollback to break the cycle. The victim txn will either restart or abort(more common) depending on how it was invoked. There is a trade-off between the frequ checking for deadlocks and how long { wait before deadlocks are broken. , 4 . 19 38:14 / 1:18:13 -deadlocks 3 = * Es CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
